text: “Egh nɨ kamaghɨn me mɨkɨm, Israelian gumazitam o ikɨzir igharazibar gumazir ian tongɨn ititam, a ofan bar isia mɨghɨribar amusɨ, o a ofan igharazim na bagh a damusɨ, kamaghɨn an asɨzim inigh izɨ na bativamin Purirpenimɨn tiar akamɨn ofa damu. Puvatɨghtɨma, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ uan gumazamizibar tongɨn a batuegham.”
